name: Byshader
description:
Byshader is a run and gun platformer, where you play as an emissary of three fairy sisters, sent to defeat a corrupt king!

On your way, you'll meet several companions who will aid you. Such as scientist Doctor G. Sballo, a scientist at the Byshader Research Institute. 

In addition, the three fairy sisters who created you are ready and willing you help you along your way! Will you succeed and destroy the evil king  Roelenvin? Or will you fail, and be killed by a mix of robots and knights?

Traverse the sewers, the lab, and more on your quest!

For Windows, Linux, and Mac.
